oracle text:
7/7

When you cast Cthulu, choose one:

- Target opponent loses 7 life and you gain 7 life;
- Destroy target creature or planeswalker and its controller loses 7 life;
- Each opponent discards their hand and you draw seven cards.

At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Cthulu unless you pay 7 life.

"No sane soul can fathom the true terror that lurks within the depths of the sea."
